nodes.text: This male member of an unknown species was the brother of Vojak. A bounty from an unknown source was placed on him around 5.5 BBY. He was assassinated by the assassin droid C-3PX on the planet Bonadan.
His death also lead to the death of his brother Vojak on Hosk Station by the same droid, as Vojak had gone to attempt to avenge his brother's death.
